title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.6 - Provision of preventive alcoholism counseling services to a child with parental consent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 305.6 - Provision of preventive alcoholism counseling services to a child with parental consent

State Regulations

Wherever possible and feasible, parental consent shall be
sought prior to the provision of preventive alcoholism counseling services to a
child. Such consent shall be requested only with the permission of the child. If such permission is granted and parental consent obtained, efforts should be
made to elicit parental participation in the preventive alcoholism counseling
services. Notes

305.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
